items.title: Graphene based terahertz absorbers
items.summary: A terahertz saturable absorber has been created using printable graphene inks with an order of magnitude higher absorption modulation than other devices produced to date.

items.title: Sexually aroused male flies unable to sleep after close encounters with females
items.summary: The urge to mate appears to override the need to sleep in flies, according to new research that hints at the importance of sleep for animals.

alternate.title: Sexually aroused male flies unable to sleep after close encounters with females

items.title: Running group helps half its graduates quit smoking
items.summary: Half the people who completed a 10-week community running program aimed at helping them quit smoking were successful in their attempt. Many others reduced their smoking, and saw their mental health improve.

alternate.title: Running group helps half its graduates quit smoking

items.title: Your stools reveal whether you can lose weight
items.summary: Something as simple as a feces sample reveals whether you can lose weight by following dietary recommendations characterized by a high content of fruit, vegetables, fibers and whole grains, report scientists.

alternate.title: Your stools reveal whether you can lose weight

thumbnail.title: Your stools reveal whether you can lose weight

items.title: Explaining bursts of activity in brains of preterm babies
items.summary: The source of spontaneous, high-amplitude bursts of activity seen in the brains of preterm babies, which are vital for healthy development, has been identified by a team of researchers.

alternate.title: Explaining bursts of activity in brains of preterm babies

items.title: Eye movements reveal temporal expectation deficits in ADHD
items.summary: A technique that measures tiny movements of the eyes may help scientists better understand and perhaps eventually improve assessment of ADHD, according to research.

alternate.title: Eye movements reveal temporal expectation deficits in ADHD

items.title: Modeling the impact of green eggs and hens
items.summary: Poultry given vegan organic chicken feed can help to produce eggs with a smaller environmental footprint than those fed non-organic feeds that contain animal by-products, new research shows.

alternate.title: Modeling the impact of green eggs and hens
